column4: guys my Thinkpad T61 is getting hot after installing ...please help !!
guys my Thinkpad T61 is getting hot after installing ...please help !!
guys my Thinkpad T61 is getting hot after installing ...please help !!
guys my Thinkpad T61 is getting hot after installing ...please help !!
guys my Thinkpad T61 is getting hot after installing ...please help !!
what do u mean?......If I use ubuntu again it will get hot?
when you installed did you shoose any options like ACPI off or NOLAPIC?
if you're SURE it's running hotter then it should, maybe some power management feature it's working right
BUT that's not necessarily a problem exactly
do you think you are suffering any heat-related performance issues or anything?
because my gues is it's probably fine
I think my CPU is slower now
do you know if your lappy uses speedstep or anything like that that?
OK many laptops have a CPU scaling feature to conserve battery under lighter cpu loads. sometime a default install neglects that feature and the CPU runs in one mode all the time
you have a little googling to do to get to know your system better. look up the model of your laptop along with CPU scaling or speedstep and linux
but I would advise you to not even bother unless it seems like a real problem
